prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: What were Stefan's thoughts and emotions when I sent him the link to Faun's Album Midgard playlist?

Stefan should be represented by the Ascendant's 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

Due to the lack of planets placement in the 9th house, Stefan should be represented by the 9th house ruler of Jupiter.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is the extracted chart data for a horary analysis of the question: “What were Stefan’s thoughts and emotions when I sent him the link to Faun’s Album Midgard playlist?” The analysis uses horary principles only. Note that in this setup you (Melissa Gale) are represented by the Ascendant (16°40′ Aries) and Stefan is represented by the 9th house ruler—Jupiter—since no planet sits in the 9th house (cusp starting at 21° Sagittarius).

Planetary Positions & Their Placements (as provided):
• Sun at 19°05′ Aquarius
• Moon at 18°34′ Gemini
• Mercury at 17°40′ Aquarius
• Venus at 2°20′ Aries
• Mars at 18°45′ Cancer (retrograde)
• Jupiter at 11°17′ Gemini

• Neptune at 28°09′ Pisces
• Pluto at 2°15′ Aquarius
• North Node at 29°30′ Pisces (retrograde)
• Chiron at 19°42′ Aries

Key House Cusps (with notable planetary inclusions):
• Ascendant (1st House): 16°40′ Aries (represents you, Melissa) – contains Uranus and Chiron
• 2nd House: starts at 28° Taurus – contains the Moon and Jupiter (note that although Jupiter appears here, for horary purposes Stefan is represented by Jupiter as the ruler of the 9th house)
• 3rd House: starts at 21° Gemini
• 4th House (IC): 8°34′ Cancer – contains Mars
• 5th House: starts at 27° Cancer
• 6th House: starts at 26° Leo
• 7th House: starts at 16° Libra
• 8th House: starts at 28° Scorpio
• 9th House: starts at 21° Sagittarius (no planets present; its ruler is Jupiter, now considered Stefan’s significator)
• 10th House (MC): 8°34′ Capricorn
• 11th House: starts at 27° Capricorn – contains Sun, Mercury and Pluto
• 12th House: starts at 26° Aquarius – contains Venus, Saturn, Neptune and North Node

Major Aspects Identified:
• Venus Sextile Pluto (orb 0°)
• Sun Sextile Chiron (orb 0°)
• Moon Square Saturn (orb 0°)
• MC Opposition IC (orb 0°)
• Mars Trine Saturn (orb 0°)
• Mercury Sextile Ascendant (orb 1°)
• Moon Sextile Chiron (orb 1°)
• Mars Square Chiron (orb 1°)
• Neptune Conjunction North Node (orb 1°)
• Moon Trine Mercury (orb 1°)
• Sun Trine Moon (orb 1°)
• Mercury Sextile Chiron (orb 2°)
• Moon Sextile Ascendant (orb 2°)
• Mars Square Ascendant (orb 2°)
• Sun Conjunction Mercury (orb 2°)
• Pluto Sextile North Node (orb 3°)
• Sun Sextile Ascendant (orb 3°)
• Chiron Conjunction Ascendant (orb 3°)
• Venus Conjunction North Node (orb 3°)
• Sun Square Uranus (orb 4°)
• Venus Conjunction Neptune (orb 4°)
• Uranus Sextile Neptune (orb 5°)
• Saturn Sextile Uranus (orb 5°)
• Jupiter Sextile Ascendant (orb 5°)
• Mars Sextile Uranus (orb 5°)
• Venus Square IC (orb 6°)
• Venus Square MC (orb 6°)
• Mercury Square Uranus (orb 6°)
• Mercury Trine Jupiter (orb 6°)
• Jupiter Square Saturn (orb 7°)
• Moon Conjunction Jupiter (orb 7°)
• Sun Trine Jupiter (orb 8°)

Patterns and Special Features:
• A notable T-Square involving the MC (8°34′ Capricorn), Venus (2°20′ Aries), and the IC (8°34′ Cancer)
• The chart exhibits a Bowl shape; the majority of planets lie in the top left quadrant
• Dominance of the Air element among the inner planets
• Cardinal mode dominance among the inner planets
• Venus and Chiron are rising
• The Moon is a waxing gibbous
• Neptune in Pisces is in the sign of its rulership
• The Sextile aspect is the most frequent (12 occurrences)
• The Sun is involved in 11 aspects

Additional Notes for Horary Analysis:
• Stefan’s representation: With no direct planetary placement occupying the 9th house, Stefan is indicated by Jupiter—the ruler of the 9th house. Jupiter’s aspects, state, and house placement should be closely observed in relation to the question.
• Your representation: The Ascendant (16°40′ Aries) stands for you, Melissa Gale. Its aspects and any connections it makes to relevant significators (especially to Jupiter) will be key in interpreting your inquiry.

This list comprises the relevant chart data required for a methodical horary interpretation of the query. Please confirm the data or provide any additional information before proceeding to the interpretative phase.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Based on the horary data provided, here is my interpretation for Stefan’s thoughts and emotions upon receiving your link:

1. Stefan’s Significator (Jupiter) sits at 11°17′ Gemini in the 2nd House. Gemini’s influence emphasizes a mental engagement with the message. His thoughts were clearly animated by curiosity and an analytical approach—the link triggered his interest on an intellectual and communicative level.

2. Jupiter forms a sextile to your Ascendant, suggesting a positive, if cautious, connection between your energy and his response. There is an openness in his mind, indicating that he found the content stimulating and thought-provoking.

3. However, Jupiter’s square to Saturn (orb of 7°) introduces a measure of reservation. Saturn’s influence suggests that beneath the initial intrigue, Stefan harbored concerns related to duty, responsibility, or loyalty. This tension implies that while he appreciated the artistic or intellectual quality of the playlist, his deeper emotional state was constrained by obligations—likely those stemming from his established relationships.

4. Additional supportive aspects include Mercury’s trine to Jupiter. This boosts a sense of clarity in the communication, indicating that his thoughts were clear and direct regarding the link, even though his emotional investment was cautious. The Moon’s conjunction with Jupiter, despite being orbited around 7°, further reinforces an emotional response that is tied to his mental reflections—a flash of admiration mingled with a touch of uncertainty.

In summary, Stefan’s mental reaction to your gesture was one of keen intellectual interest and momentary excitement. Emotionally, however, he experienced an undercurrent of constraint likely related to his current commitments. His mind was energized by the music and the ideas it evoked, yet his sense of responsibility imposed limits on how deeply he allowed himself to be affected.
